entry.title: Final bonus added, new problems added
entry.summary:
We have now extended the specification with a last bonus. This is the last modification to the specification that will be made, barring unforeseen errors.

We will freeze the scoreboard on Mon, 12 July at 11:00 UTC.

Participants must submit their source code to be elligible for prizes. This can be done via the team profile page in the portal. We will accept submissions of source code until Tue, 13 July at 00:00 UTC.

entry.title: Added WALLHACK bonus to spec, more problems added
entry.summary: We added a new type of bonus to the specification. We've also added new problems and added new bonuses to the existing problems.

entry.title: Correction in GLOBALIST specification
entry.summary: We fixed a naming inconsistency in the definition of the GLOBALIST bonus in the specification.

entry.title: Bonuses added to spec, new problems added
entry.summary:
The Lightning Division (first 24 hours of the contest) has now ended. We hope everyone had fun so far!

We have now extended the specification with bonuses, which allow you gain certain advantages in other problems.

We have also added 10 new problems to poses.live.

The scoreboard will remain frozen for another half hour, until 12:30 UTC.

entry.title: New problems added, HTTP API addition
entry.summary:
We have added 19 new problems to poses.live.

We would like to remind everyone that the Lightning Division ends in twelve hours on Sat, 10 July 12:00 (noon) UTC.

To keep things exciting, we will freeze the scoreboard temporarily on Sat, 10 July from 11:30 to 12:30 UTC. We've also limited the scoreboard to teams with at least one valid solution.

Additionally, we have updated the specification with a new API endpoint to obtain some information about submitted poses.

entry.title: ICFPC2021 has started
entry.summary:
Welcome to ICFPC2021!

We have published a first version of the specification.

Teams can register, submit solutions and view the current scoreboard at our web portal located at poses.live.

Good luck, and have fun!

entry.title: PSA
entry.summary: We strongly recommend participants this year to wear waterproof clothing and leave their phone in a locker.

entry.title: Atom Feed
entry.summary: An atom feed is now available for contest updates.

entry.title: Discord Server
entry.summary: We have set up a Discord server for participants to communicate and socialise during the contest. You can join the server here. Please note that we use the Berlin Code of Conduct. This website remains the single source of truth for the contest and all announcements will be posted here.
